response.overview: Daggara Duraanga is about Gowtham (Sumanth) who is an ad filmmaker who creates an "imaginary model" for one of his ad films. That model happens to be Meenakshi (Vedhika), whose engagement is canceled due to Gowthamâ€™s sleazy ads. Meenakshi comes to Hyderabad from Vizag to take action on that ad agency. What happens next? Watch the movie and find out.
response.title: Daggara Duraanga
